function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of precise knowledge about upcoming pandemics and their spreading behavior","Impact":"Inability to prepare for future pandemics, leading to uncontrolled outbreaks and high mortality rates.","Mitigation":"Investing in ongoing research and surveillance programs to monitor potential pandemic threats.","Technologies":"Advanced data analytics and artificial intelligence for early detection and monitoring of potential pandemics.","People":"General public, health authorities, and policymakers","Owner":"Health organizations, research institutions, and government bodies"},{"Description":"Inadequate building codes and certificates for post-pandemic residential buildings","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to contagious diseases in residential environments, leading to rapid spread and high infection rates.","Mitigation":"Developing and implementing new building codes focused on disease prevention and resilience, as well as incorporating green certificates for healthy living environments.","Technologies":"Smart building design, ventilation systems, and antimicrobial materials for building surfaces.","People":"Architects, urban planners, developers, and residents","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations, and building industry stakeholders"},{"Description":"Reliance on energy-consuming technologies and smart systems for work from home practices","Impact":"Increased energy consumption and potential strain on energy resources, leading to environmental impact and sustainability challenges.","Mitigation":"Promoting energy-efficient technologies, renewable energy sources, and sustainable practices for remote work environments.","Technologies":"Renewable energy systems, IoT devices for energy monitoring, and sustainable building design for home offices.","People":"Remote workers, employers, and households","Owner":"Energy providers, environmental agencies, and sustainability organizations"}]}
